title: The Wicked Earl
description: The very proper Miss Langley does not know whatshe has done to encourage the attentions of a lord,only that they are most unwanted andvery improper!So when a handsome stranger saves her from hisclutches, Madeline is too relieved to suspect thather tall, dark defender may have a less thanrespectable reputationâ€¦.
author: Margaret McPhee
